name: RadioXtra

”Alexa Play Radio Extra”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio extra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Radio Xtra - The Home Of The Hits playing the biggest hits from the 80s to the best music of today across the UK and beyond. We're online at radioxtra.co.uk, on our app (Radio Xtra UK) via Smartspeaker and in some places on DAB+.
For more information, check out radioxtra.co.uk
